pr_title: Convert the exportable Event to an interface

timeline.message: change Event to an interface with an impl to match
make TimedEvent implement the Event interface
don't make copies of already immutable event data

timeline.bodyText: Instances of RawTimedEventWithEvent should be transformed into RawTimedEvent to avoid holding references to memory from the api.Event that we store.
timeline.author: bogdandrutu

replies.bodyText: ah, yes, you are correct. I'll write a unit test that verifies this, as well, since we don't have one at the moment.
replies.author: jkwatson

timeline.message: copy the wrapped event, so as not to hold to user's data
